name: Fireforce
description:
Turn based strategy. Your goal is to fight with Fire that gets Out of Control. Try to save the Village using your Fire Fighters with their extinguishing capacity!

HOW TO PLAY?

  1. with mouse! and keyboard. LMB mainly
  2. your goal is to keep fire in control and save the Village
  3. fire can randomly spread to adjacent fields.
  4. the longer fire burn the stronger he gets!
  5. control the Fire Fighters, you can use your Action Points to move, or to attack fire with water!
  6. use TAB to switch between Fire Fighters
